title: Tinder, B2K, Nene Leakes, Game of Thrones and more.
itunes:title: Tinder, B2K, Nene Leakes, Game of Thrones and more.
description:
Today's show opens with us seeing a different side of Junior.  We have the Tinder portion of the show and we may get some throwback action from the Nephew.  Raz B has officially quit the Millennium Tour due to personal reasons.  NeNe Leakes reports that her husband Greg is cancer free.  The officer responsible for the death of Eric Garner is still working.  Uncle Steve is here with his Game of Thrones Update and it is a motion picture.  Plus, the accent is on point.  When it comes to shots, bartenders prefer Jack Daniels.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog tells us that you want more, you must do more.  Be comfortable with being uncomfortable.  Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
